briefTitle: Study of Exercise to Manage Distress During Breast Screening
officialTitle: Effectiveness of Exercise Training and Self Management in the Attenuation of Anxiety and Depressive Symptoms Following Breast Biopsy
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Symptoms of anxiety will be assessed using patient reported anxiety inventory
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* undergoing breast biopsy at St. Joseph's Health Care, London Ontario
* minimum BI-RADS 4a
* physically inactive

Exclusion Criteria:

* meeting Health Canada Guidelines for Physical Activity for past 6 months
* medical contraindications to exercise
* unable to participate in moderate intensity exercise program
